scenario_text.value: The doorway must’ve opened for some reason...

...and humans and Kemonogami wound up getting
lost in each other’s worlds.

That must be what this image of humans and
monsters being drawn into the gate is about.

Reminds me of how we suddenly found ourselves
thrown into this world.

No doubt some of the disappearances occurred
because something went wrong with the gate.

So if it opened again, would it lead to chaos
like this?

In all likelihood, yes. But there’s a chance
we’ll be able to do something about it.

The top mural shows humans treating monsters
as gods. Consider your current relationships.

These seem like clear indications that there
are ways for humans and monsters to coexist.

Opening the gate may be dangerous, but I
would like to think it’s not necessarily bad.
